verbs.description: Trump [V: is] accused of having an affair with former porn star Stormy Daniels in 2006 .
[ARG1: Trump] is [V: accused] [ARG2: of having an affair with former porn star Stormy Daniels in 2006] .
[ARG0: Trump] is accused of [V: having] [ARG1: an affair with former porn star Stormy Daniels] [ARGM-TMP: in 2006] .
